__e: Be of good cheer, Salvation is at hand.
You don't think it was a punishment retribution for what he did?
Payback for the night you and your friends called my house.
Tell him. We don't want any more trouble, or else I will retaliate.
We demand that the woman you call Carter be brought before us so we may gain retribution.
And now that you have, you can take your revenge.
Who knows, maybe this is retribution.
Has it ever crossed your mind that chasing criminals is work and not revenge?
I expect he will arrive soon enough, seeking his retribution.
There are only two people here who have the right to ask for an eye for an eye.
In my country, it is tradition-- when the men are out seeking vengeance, the women-- they stay home, and they drink.
